titleStmt.title: G. C. Wharton to the Military Board of Kentucky
CWG1387

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Correspondence, 1859-1862

body.p: WI see by a notice in the papers that you are furnishing the necessary blanks to be used in the organization of the Home Guard companies; We are forming a company here and you will confer a favor by sending me the necessary blanks

To the Military Committe
Frankfort
Ky
